interpretation:
The right-facing fist is a symbol of power and force. This card represents the energy of action, aggression, and determination. It signifies the need to take control of a situation and make things happen. The right-facing fist can be a sign of strength, but it can also indicate a need for caution, as too much force can lead to negative consequences. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may indicate a need to stand up for oneself or take charge of a situation. It can also suggest a need for physical action or exertion. The right-facing fist is a call to action and encourages the seeker to be bold and assertive.

Associated with the element of fire, this card represents the transformative power of passion and energy. It reminds us that sometimes we need to take risks and push ourselves outside of our comfort zones in order to achieve our goals. The right-facing fist is a reminder that we have the power within us to make things happen and create change in our lives.
